name: Brandastic.com
tagline: Digital Marketing, SEO, PPC, Magento Development
description:
Brandastic is a National & Award-Winning Digital Marketing Agency specializing in a holistic approach to your brand story. Building a solid foundation through branding, e-commerce development (Magento Certified & Shopify Partner), SEO, and online marketing (PPC), their personalized approach allows them to ignite the potential of their clients for future growth.
Having offices in Orange County, Los Angeles, and Austin Texas, Brandastic has been featured in USA Today, Yahoo Finance and Forbes as a Top Agency to work with.
